question: WHEN WILL I RECEIVE MY ORDER?
answer: DOMESTIC TRANSMISSIONS TYPICALLY ARRIVE WITHIN 5-7 BUSINESS DAYS. INTERNATIONAL ARRIVALS ARE SUBJECT TO THE VOID. A TRACKING NUMBER WILL BE SENT TO YOUR INBOX ONCE THE ARTIFACT HAS SHIPPED.

question: HOW DO THE GARMENTS FIT?
answer: OUR SILHOUETTES ARE INTENTIONALLY EXAGGERATED AND OVERSIZED. CONSULT THE SIZING CHART ON EACH PRODUCT PAGE. WHEN IN DOUBT, EMBRACE THE UNCONVENTIONAL FIT. THIS IS THE UNIFORM.

question: CAN I RETURN MY ORDER?
answer: ALL SALES ARE FINAL. EACH PIECE IS CONSIDERED A UNIQUE ARTIFACT. WE DO NOT ACCEPT RETURNS OR EXCHANGES. ENSURE YOUR SELECTION IS CORRECT BEFORE COMPLETING THE TRANSACTION.

question: WILL YOU RESTOCK SOLD OUT ITEMS?
answer: RARELY. OUR COLLECTIONS ARE PRODUCED IN LIMITED QUANTITIES TO MAINTAIN EXCLUSIVITY. DO NOT EXPECT REPEATED TRANSMISSIONS. SUBSCRIBE TO BE NOTIFIED OF NEW ARTIFACTS.

question: HOW DO I CARE FOR MY PIECES?
answer: OUR GARMENTS ARE DESIGNED TO DEGRADE WITH WEAR, CREATING A UNIQUE PATINA. WASH COLD, HANG DRY, OR DO NOT WASH AT ALL. EMBRACE THE DECAY. FOR LEATHER AND SILVER, CONSULT A SPECIALIST.

question: WHAT ARE THE FRAGRANCES MADE OF?
answer: THE FORMULAS ARE PROPRIETARY. NOTES ARE LISTED ON THE PRODUCT PAGE. OUR SCENTS ARE UNISEX, DESIGNED TO BE UNFORGETTABLE AND UNAPOLOGETIC. THEY ARE NOT FOR EVERYONE.

question: HOW CAN I CONTACT SUPPORT?
answer: FOR ISSUES REGARDING AN EXISTING ORDER, SEND A TRANSMISSION TO [SUPPORT@YOURDOMAIN.COM]. INCLUDE YOUR ORDER NUMBER. WE WILL RESPOND WHEN ABLE.
